introductoryNarration.content: Welcome to your privacy control center where you manage personal data protection and civic engagement visibility. This interface gives you complete control over what information you share and how your civic participation appears to others.

navigationGuidance.content: The privacy dashboard displays your current settings across different categories. privacyNotice.content: Your privacy settings are enforced using advanced cryptographic techniques. Personal data never leaves your control, and civic participation can be verified without revealing individual choices. The system is designed with privacy by default principles.
